title: Mouth ulcers
description: Mouth ulcers are common and should clear up on their own within a week or two. They’re rarely a sign of anything serious, but may be uncomfortable to live with.

header.value: Mouth ulcers are common and should clear up on their own within a week or two. They’re rarely a sign of anything serious, but may be uncomfortable to live with.

value.alt: Small cluster of 4 clear coloured mouth ulcers on the inside of the bottom lip
Clear white coloured mouth ulcer on the tip of the tongue
